name: Matrimony
description: A matrimony platform that connects people for marriage, with features like profile management and messaging.
challenges: Handling complex search functionality and ensuring data security.
futurePlans: Adding AI-based matchmaking and live video calling features.

name: Crowd Funding
description: A platform that helps users raise funds for various causes through community support.
challenges: Integrating payment gateways and ensuring smooth transaction flows.
futurePlans: Introducing recurring donations and implementing advanced reporting features.

name: Lost and Found
description: A platform for people to report lost items and search for found items in their local area.
challenges: Creating a location-based search and managing large data sets.
futurePlans: Adding user profiles, notifications, and mobile app support.
